title: Average daily television viewing time in France 2005 to 2018
summary: The total minutes of Time hours , including fuel , reached a peak minutes of over 423 million British pounds in 2018 .
This marked an increase of about 18 million British pounds on the previous Year .
For the Time industry excluding fuel hours , this figure similarly indicated a record minutes in 2018 with a significant rise on the Year prior .
gold: This statistic shows the average time individuals spent watching television per day in France from 2005 to 2018.
The data refers to television owners in metropolitan France aged four years and older.
In 2018 , the average daily television viewing time in France came to three hours and 36 minutes , six minute less than one year earlier and a continuous slight decrease since 2015 .
